医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现奥斯汀社区的空气污染增加了与哮喘相关的急诊就诊次数戴尔医学院和华盛顿大学研究人员的一项新研究表明，奥斯汀社区的空气污染与哮喘相关的急诊室 (ER) 就诊率增加有关，尤其是在黑人和拉丁裔居民比例较高的地区。德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校自然科学学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Air-pollution-in-Austin-neighborhoods-raises-asthma-lated-ER-visits-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Air-pollution-in-Austin-neighborhoods-raises-asthma-lated-ER-visits-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fac41434-2db5-4b5d-b9ef-58364baa759b Tue, 19 Mar 2024 14:16:36 -0400 Air pollution in Austin neighborhoods raises asthma-related ER visits, study finds
这一发现可能会彻底改变基于干细胞的帕金森病大脑修复疗法戈尔韦大学的神经科学家取得了一项令人兴奋的发现，可能会彻底改变基于干细胞的帕金森病大脑修复疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Discovery-could-revolutionize-stem-cell-based-brain-repair-therapy-for-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Discovery-could-revolutionize-stem-cell-based-brain-repair-therapy-for-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7702d787-71a7-472a-b327-5a49117aeab2 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 14:09:17 -0400 Discovery could revolutionize stem cell-based brain repair therapy for Parkinson's disease
应对努力对于老年男性的长寿更为重要应对被定义为管理压力源的认知和行为努力，人们认为这些压力源超出了他们有效应对的能力和资源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Coping-effort-more-crucial-for-longevity-in-older-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/Coping-effort-more-crucial-for-longevity-in-older-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36559d62-e142-4d1c-a870-22b6f820ec50 Tue, 19 Mar 2024 14:02:42 -0400 Coping effort more crucial for longevity in older men

新研究报告称，到 2021 年，全球将有超过 30 亿人患有神经系统疾病研究人员估计了 1990 年至 2021 年间 37 种神经系统疾病及其相关风险因素造成的全球、区域和国家健康损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/More-than-3-billion-people-worldwide-lived-with-a-neurological-condition-in-2021-new-study-reports.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240319/More-than-3-billion-people-worldwide-lived-with-a-neurological-condition-in-2021-new-study-reports.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b032afd-72f4-4520-91b9-c79b235221fe Tue, 19 Mar 2024 10:38:00 -0400 More than 3 billion people worldwide lived with a neurological condition in 2021, new study reports
